overview: What did the old parliament look like when Vikings settled Iceland in 874 A.D.? How has the Icelandic environment changed since man first arrived? Is the human species a blight on the face of the Earth? What will the future look like here? Will the glaciers melt whether we like it or not? Will there be a volcanic eruption in the Reykjavik area? Will soil erosion blow Iceland back into the ocean? Can natural waterfalls replace energy with pollutants - and at what cost to the landscape?
title: Another Look At Iceland
